article_title: VA Scheduling Scandal Obscures System's Healthcare Quality, Interoperability Gains

article_metadata.author: Neil Versel

og.description: There are so many sad and unfortunate things about the enrollment scandal at the Veterans Health Administration. There's the secret waiting lists — and subsequent cover-up — at the Phoenix VA hospital that made it look like new enrollees got care within 24 days, when the actual number was closer to [...]
